name: Randy man
text: Save some money by picking up pizza of any of the many combinations (or make up your own) of pizzas  and taking it at home to cook so the crust is that "just baked" quality we all love! â€¦More

name: Rick Lang
text: Foods great and staff is. Friendly and helpful.And yes Elvis has left the hold.

name: Melinda Daniel
text: Best non -baked pizza in town. The variety is excellent so I often go there as opposed to a pizza restaurant because there is usually no line and they are fast. I have no problem taking it home and waiting 25 minutes to cook. The food is great!

name: Judy T.
text: Good prices when there's a house full of kids and you don't want to hassle with dinner.  Also the staff is very nice and the place is always clean.  I can't comment on the pizza because I am not a pizza eater.

name: Sheryl Kirk
text: This is a frequent place for us. I love baking pizza at home. I get gourmet vegetarian and my husband likes the pepperoni. The ordering is quick. I usually have  coupon. The staff are friendly,  always calling out, hello.

name: crystal hunt
text: Amazing pizza for a great price! There pizza is cheesy and fresh and great for when your busy, just swing by pick it up and pop it in your oven when you get home! Plus they except EBT which is a bonus! Not to mention their cheesy breads and salads are amazing and a steal of a deal!

name: Cyan1dal Gaming
text:
Absolutely REFUSED  to provide a vegetarian option on a public promotion. XL pepperoni and sausage for 9$ sure! Can you take off the meat?
Yeah but we won't honor the special price, even though that would save us money. â€¦More

name: Alycia Nash
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PLACE!!! I have never had an issue here. It is teenagers working, maybe their first job ever, and they handle themselves pretty darn well. Seems to always be some person who is entitled and whiney complaining about the â€¦More

text: This gary holt rate 10 outstanding in there food Cleaning Place and safe. All the time come in Paradise Ca.

name: Kendall Proffer

name: Roxanne Doty
text: Well the staff are under pressure and the place was packed. Understandable. However I called at 2pm ordered my pizzas to be ready by 615 Here it is 640pm my pizzas not ready and I'm a little bit disappointed. I will never come here again!

name: Teresa Javid-Morales
text: Great for a quick dinner. We love it!

name: Emily Salmon
text: Stoked on the gluten free crust! The regular crust is a bit thick for our taste, so we get the delite,  then take it off the tray for the last few minutes to help crunchify it a bit ;)

name: David Wolfe
text: So one orders a deluxe vegetarian with red sauce, no cheese or parm. And what do we get a vegetarian with white sauce. So when they remake it it is a regular vegetarian without the deluxe vegetables. Sorry totally wrong. Not sure we will be back. I might as well make it at home myself.

name: Cindy Laudari
text: Great prices on pizzas you just pop in the oven when you get home , and they have a special price for pizzas on a special day...so yes get your pizzas here...

text: Papa Murphy's great place to get pizzas not expensive you do have to bake it yourself though it don't bother me none

name: John Morton
text: Really kind people up here on the ridge :) I definitely notice the friendliness of the staff, it's really nice. I always call ahead and order, ready by the time I drive there to get it from Magalia. Sometimes they have really good deals going on like 2 for 7 cookie doughs or whatever.
